content: MT-BR-40 OC Bracket Medium-duty C-Channel bracket for outdoor applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Brackets- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Economical – high load/weight ratio and rapid assembly make MT strut channel a more efficient alternative to welded MEP support structures Easy to install – compatible with the Hilti MT Twist-Lock, a faster alternative to spring nuts for assembling a modular support system Adjustable – two slotted holes simplify leveling and fine adjustment Extensive software support – PROFIS Modular Support Engineering, the MEP Support Selector, Revit® families, and plug-ins for Staad Pro® and Smart 3D® are all available to streamline design and ordering Applications Supporting pipe rings, ventilation ducts, cable trays and other MEP support hardware Mounting light-duty MEP installations on concrete and steel Suitable for use in moderately corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q235 or better steel Surface finish: Outdoor Coating Material thickness: 8 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q235 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2271443 - Bracket MT-BR-40 300 OC - Package Size 10 pc - 2271445 - Bracket MT-BR-40 450 OC - Package Size 10 pc - 2271452 - Bracket MT-BR-40 600 OC - Package Size 10 pc - 2271447 - Bracket MT-BR-40 1000 OC - Package Size 10 pc
